text: Ezɨ Filistian gumazir dapaniba bulmakaun sueba ko dafaribar itir agɨrir 7plan mɨsɨngizir puvatɨziba inigha iza Delaila ganɨngi. Ezɨ gumazir maba Delaila akui naghɨn mongeghav iti. Ezɨ Delaila Samsonɨn suemning ko dafarimning ike. Egha Delaila a gaghura ghaze, “Samson, Filistiaba nɨn suighasa izi!” Ezɨ a dɨkavima bulmakaun agɨrir kaba, mati strin avir mɨzariamɨn boroghɨn ikia isia dɨghoraghirezi moghɨn, dɨghoraghire. Ezɨ Filistiaba an gavgavimɨn mɨngarim gɨfozir puvatɨghavɨra iti.
